title: Album Page, "Half-Timbered Building, Coucy-le-Château", June 1, 1887
medium: Graphite on off-white paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner: 6; lower right corner: 7; to right of drawing: House half timber; below drawing:  Coucy-le-Château / June 1 1887.
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding.  Depicted is a half-timbered and plaster building seen from the rear.  The building is raised up on a plain, masonry lower level, and is then divided by a large sill on which sits the half-timbered story.  The timbering is patterned like arrows.  Smoke swirls out of the short chimney stack.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Half-Timbered Building, Coucy-le-Château", June 1, 1887.
June 1, 1887. Graphite on off-white paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-180.
